name: research_orchestrator
description: Orchestrates comprehensive research for marketing campaigns by analyzing trends, conducting web research, and generating cited reports.

skills.name: Parallel Research Coordination
skills.description: Executes simultaneous research on YouTube trends, Google Search trends, and campaign objectives

skills.name: Research Synthesis and Integration
skills.description: Merges findings from multiple research streams into coherent insights

skills.name: Research Quality Evaluation
skills.description: Critically evaluates research completeness and identifies knowledge gaps

skills.name: Iterative Research Refinement
skills.description: Conducts follow-up searches based on identified gaps to enhance research depth

skills.name: Cited Report Generation
skills.description: Produces professionally formatted research reports with inline citations

skills.name: PDF Artifact Creation
skills.description: Saves research findings as PDF artifacts for easy sharing and review
